# k8s_getambassador_io_tracing_service_v3alpha1 (Resource)

TracingService is the Schema for the tracingservices API

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "k8s_getambassador_io_tracing_service_v3alpha1" "minimal" {
  metadata = {
    name = "test"
  }
}
```
